great to meet you! My name is Elvis Plesky, I will assist you in the beginning of your journey with Plesk.

steps.title: Create a WordPress website
steps.description:
%%install|wp-toolkit|Install a new WordPress website|Open your WordPress website%% or import your %%link|existing WordPress instance|/modules/site-import/index.php/site-migration/new-migration|false%%.

With the WordPress Toolkit you create your WordPress website easily within minutes. The toolkit allows enabling a variety of development workflows for WordPress admins and developers of all skill levels, from beginners to pros. Install or import your first WordPress website now!

steps.title: Add an SSL certificate and secure your website
steps.description:
Let's secure your WordPress website with the help of the %%extlink|advisor%%.

The %%extname|advisor%% allows you to secure all your websites with SSL at one single click. Additionally, this extension lets you activate HTTP/2 for more performance on all your sites.

steps.title: Optimize your website with %%extname|pagespeed-insights%%
steps.description: Check your WordPress website with %%extlink|pagespeed-insights%% and boost your website performance with Google PageSpeed for Apache.
